entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:10 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
